page.title: 16Games we play in Kirkby
page.content: My name is Sam and I like to play the game called "Up and Down" in the playground. This is how you play it. Someone has to be the one who catches you, he is called {man}. The other people who are playing the game stand in a semi circle that is already drawn on our playground. There are 2 of these semi circles and they are part of the netball pitch. The person who is {man}has to call out somebody's name and that person has to run , without getting caught, to the other semi circle. If he gets there everyone playing can run to the other semi circle and the person who is {man}has to ask someone else to run. But if he catches the one he is chasing, then that person has to become one of the catchers and chase the next person to run. The winner is the last person to be caught.
